name: Beijing Landmark Tour
description: If you have a limited amount of time in Beijing and want to see Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City, the Summer Palace and the Temple of Heaven all in one day, then this itinerary will achieve that goal. However you might feel a bit "monument-ed out" by the end of it. We top it off with a trip to Beijing's most touristy market - Xiushui Silk Market. Its better if you can stretch this itinerary over two days and add in some other items, we suggest you check our two and three day itineraries. Also this tour does not get you to the Great Wall, but we have another one day tour which does.
